attributes.action: Review the current taxation system regarding company cars.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current system unfairly penalises users of company cars whose use of the car is essential to their work. 
A system needs to be created that differentiates between the provision of a car as a perk and that of an essential tool.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
